constraints.name: no_code_outside_implement
constraints.text: NEVER write application code outside of /implement skill invocation
constraints.why: Code written outside /implement bypasses review and audit gates

constraints.name: always_complete_review_audit
constraints.text: ALWAYS complete the full implement → review → audit cycle
constraints.why: Partial cycles leave unreviewed code in the codebase

constraints.name: validate_bug_eligibility
constraints.text: ALWAYS validate bug eligibility before /bug implementation
constraints.why: Prevents feature work from bypassing PRD/SDD gates via /bug
